questionHeader: Based on the fact that you have got to know this information, rate each of the decisions below on its appropriateness for Graceramics. 1 stands for least desirable decision, 2 stands for desirable decision and 3 stands for most desirable decision. What would you do?

alternatives.alternativeText: a) You negotiates with the hotel to change the design to something that can be re-labelled and re-used.
b) You request the hotel to return the cups so that she can recycle them.
c) You reject the order without questions.
d) You accept the order without questions and reservations
